title: Contract Concubine - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Ancient Times   Assassins   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Contracts   Cross-dressing   Empires   Female Protagonist   Imperial Harem   Reverse Harem   Slow Romance
author: Raison
description: One day, Yesuh, a famous assassin, receives a strange request from a suspicious man. She’s never received such a ridiculous request before, but after hearing how much the odd man was willing to pay, she decides to bite the bullet and take on the request.However, upon starting the mission, Yesuh is shocked to find out that her suspicious employer is actually–?!>
